name: Pirate Defense
description: Pirate Defense eschews the traditional tower defense model by letting you get as close as to the action as you dare. Each map features multiple branching pathways which are designed to reward players who make strategic choices in their tower placement and choice.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 Equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Pirate Siege requires an HTC Vive
